name: Potion of Healing
effect_description: You regain hit points when you drink this potion. The number of hit points depends on the potion's rarity.

name: Potion of Greater Healing
effect_description: You regain hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Potion of Superior Healing
effect_description: You regain hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Potion of Supreme Healing
effect_description: You regain hit points when you drink this potion.

name: Potion of Climbing
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour. During this time, you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks you make to climb.

name: Potion of Fire Breath
effect_description: After drinking this potion, you can use a bonus action to exhale fire at a target within 30 feet. The target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The effect ends after you exhale the fire three times or when 1 hour has passed.

name: Potion of Growth
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain the 'enlarge' effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required).

name: Potion of Heroism
effect_description: For 1 hour after drinking it, you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the bless spell (no concentration required).

name: Potion of Invisibility
effect_description: This potion's container looks empty but feels as though it holds liquid. When you drink it, you become invisible for 1 hour. Anything you wear or carry is invisible with you. The effect ends early if you attack or cast a spell.

name: Potion of Mind Reading
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the detect thoughts spell (save DC 13). The potion's effect doesn't require concentration.

name: Potion of Poison
effect_description: This concoction looks, smells, and tastes like a potion of healing or other beneficial potion. However, it is actually poison masked by illusion magic. If you drink it, you take 3d6 poison damage, and you must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned.

name: Potion of Resistance
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain resistance to one type of damage for 1 hour. The type depends on the potion variety.

name: Potion of Speed
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the haste spell for 1 minute (no concentration required).

name: Potion of Water Breathing
effect_description: You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion. Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

name: Potion of Flying
effect_description: When you drink this potion, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 hour and can hover. If you're in the air when the potion wears off, you fall unless you have some other means of staying aloft.

name: Potion of Hill Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

name: Potion of Frost Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

name: Potion of Stone Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

name: Potion of Fire Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 25 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

name: Potion of Cloud Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 27 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

name: Potion of Storm Giant Strength
effect_description: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 29 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.
